apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji depicts two individuals, one with a deep, rich dark skin tone and the other with a lighter complexion, embracing lovingly. A vibrant, glossy red heart floats between them, rendered with Apple's signature 3D shading and soft gradients, conveying deep affection and connection. The smooth, rounded edges and realistic lighting on Apple devices lend a genuine and tender feel to this symbol of partnership and enduring love, perfect for expressing romantic feelings or celebrating relationships.
